name: TinyDrawer

before-close.description: The callback before the pop-up window closes, returning false will prevent the pop-up window from closing
before-close.description_zh: 弹窗关闭前的回调，返回 false 会阻止弹窗关闭

dragable.description: Whether to enable the width of the drawer
dragable.description_zh: 是否开启抽屉的宽度拖拽功能

mask.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

mask-closable.description: By default, when the pop-up window is opened, you can click the mask layer to close the pop-up window, and set mask-closable to false to disable the feature
mask-closable.description_zh: 默认情况下，弹窗打开后，可以单击遮罩层关闭弹窗，设置 mask-closable 为 false 后将禁用该功能

placement.description: Set the orientation of the drawer

show-close.description: Whether or not to display the close icon

show-footer.description: Whether or not to show the bottom

show-header.description: Whether or not to show the head

visible.description: Control the display and closure of drawers
visible.description_zh: 控制抽屉的显示与关闭

width.description: Sets the width of the drawer

:z-index.description: Custom stacking order (may be used for some special scenes, such as when occluded)
:z-index.description_zh: 自定义堆叠顺序（对于某些特殊场景，比如被遮挡时可能会用到）

events.name: confirm
events.description: Confirm event, valid when :show-footer="true" is set
events.description_zh: 确认事件，设置 :show-footer="true" 时有效

slots.name: header-right
slots.description: Slot on the right side of the head

description: 从页面侧边弹出的内容容器。
description_zh: 从页面侧边弹出的内容容器。
